translation.Name: Rio Computer - System #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: Warning! Emergency generators fuel capacity is below 50%. The system will deactivate or reduce the items listed by the personnel responsible for this facility, Caio PhD, as a way to reduce the power consumption until fuel capacity is over 90%.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: The deactivated or reduced items can be manually reactivated, but it is not recommended until fuel capacity is at a good level.
